translation: At that point, the Bhagavān produced a golden hand from inside his robe, touched the head of that Amogha-darśana, and again produced a broad and long tongue, which he addressed to Amogha-darśana, saying, "Good, good, you Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 汝今乃能為諸眾生如是歎說如來、應供、等正覺真實功德也。
translation: Now, are you able to thus praise the true merits of the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One for all sentient beings?

translation: If someone were to say, 'When sentient beings in the world have no protection, then someone capable of providing protection would appear in the world to provide protection.'

translation: If he also says, 'When sentient beings in the world have no refuge, then there must be inconceivable and immeasurable eloquence that appears in the world and can give sentient beings great refuge.'

translation: If they also say, 'When sentient beings in the world engage in many acts of desire, many acts of anger, and many acts of delusion, then there must be a great teacher without desire, anger, or delusion who comes into the world to remove the three poisons.'

source_sentence: 不空見！

source_sentence: 若復說言：『世間眾生多慳悋時、多嫉妬時，是時必有遠離慳嫉、好行布施大師出興為破慳嫉。』
translation: If he also says, 'When sentient beings in the world are often stingy and jealous, then there must be a great teacher who parts with stinginess and generosity and rises up to break stinginess and jealousy.'

source_sentence: 不空見！
translation: Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 當知即是善說如來也。
translation: You should know that this is the well-explained Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「復次，不空見！
translation: "Furthermore, view of nonemptyness!

source_sentence: 若復說言：『世間眾生無有慚愧、羞恥之行，是時必有慚愧、羞恥大師出世除無慚恥。』
translation: If they also say, 'When sentient beings in the world lack the capacity to act conscientiously and shamefully, then there will be conscience and shame, and the great teacher will leave the world without conscience and shame.'

source_sentence: 不空見！
translation: Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 當知即是善說如來也。
translation: You should know that this is the well-explained Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「復次，不空見！

source_sentence: 若復說言：『世間眾生多行憍慢、貢高之事，是時必有和敬、調柔大師出世為除憍慢。』
translation: If they also say, 'Many sentient beings in the world engage in conceited and arrogant behavior, then a great teacher of harmony and gentleness will come into the world to remove conceit.'

source_sentence: 不空見！
translation: Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 當知即是善說如來也。
translation: You should know that this is the well-explained Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「復次，不空見！
translation: "Furthermore, view of nonemptyness!

source_sentence: 若復說言：『世間眾生無有慈悲、不能喜捨、多行瞋恚、穢濁毒心，是時必有斷除瞋毒、具足四等導師出世教修慈悲、大利益事。』
translation: If they also say, 'When sentient beings lack compassion, aren't capable of joy and equanimity, and often act with anger and a poisonous, defiled mind, then there must be instructors who end the poison of anger and perfect the four qualities of compassion and great benefit that are cultivated by supramundane teachers.'

source_sentence: 不空見！
translation: Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 當知即是善說如來也。
translation: You should know that this is the well-explained Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「復次，不空見！
translation: "Furthermore, view of nonemptyness!

source_sentence: 若復說言：『世若多惡、無善眾生，其有能教令生善根、先有善根令其增廣如是利益大師出興。』
translation: If he also says, 'Suppose there are many unwholesome and unwholesome sentient beings in the world who can be taught to produce good roots and who have prior good roots that will increase and develop such benefits, then the great teacher will arise.'

source_sentence: 不空見！
translation: Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 當知則是善說如來也。
translation: You should know that this is the well-explained Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「復次，不空見！
translation: "Furthermore, Amoghavajra!

source_sentence: 若復說言：『五濁惡世眾生病增，世有大人能行利益，導以出法安樂眾生。』
translation: Suppose he also says, 'The five turbidities of the bad world increase the number of illnesses, and there are adults in the world who perform beneficial actions and guide sentient beings to happiness by producing the Dharma.'

source_sentence: 不空見！
translation: Amogha-darśana!

source_sentence: 當知是言則謂我也。
translation: You should know that this is called the self.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 吾今出於五濁惡世，宣揚妙法、斷除邪垢，能多利益諸眾生故。」
translation: Now, I've emerged from the five turbid and evil worlds to proclaim the wonderful Dharma, eradicate wrong defilements, and provide many benefits to sentient beings."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊手摩不空見菩薩頂時，即以神力於一念間令此大眾咸見東方無量無邊不可說阿僧祇現在一切諸佛國土，彼國土中諸佛、世尊未滅度者，及彼眾生一切境界皆悉現前，亦聞彼佛說法音聲，亦見彼剎清淨莊嚴種種具足；如是乃至南、西、北方、四維、上、下十方所有諸佛淨土，一切境界明了現前，若觀掌中菴摩勒果。
translation: At the time, when the Bhagavān put his hand on the top of that Amogha-darśana's head, he caused this large crowd to see, with a moment of miraculous power, all the Buddha-lands of the east, the measureless, limitless, ineffable, and incalculable present, and all the sentient beings in those lands, the sounds of their buddhas and Bhagavān's teachings, and the various ways in which the purity and adornment of those buddhas were fully manifested, and so on, to the south, west, north, the four counterpoints, the upper, and the lower ten directions, all of which were the pure lands of the buddhas, and all of their realms were clearly manifested, as if he were examining the fruit of Anmālā in his palm.

source_sentence: 又復世尊以手摩彼不空見菩薩摩訶薩頂時，以佛神力及不空見本願因緣，於一念間即見十方無量無邊阿僧祇不可數過去諸佛入涅槃者，乃至彼剎清淨莊嚴，了了分明若觀手掌；又蒙佛力，亦見當來諸佛、世尊、清淨剎土莊嚴具足。
translation: Furthermore, when the Bhagavān put his hand on the top of that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva's head, by virtue of the Buddha's miraculous power and the causes and conditions of Bhagavān's past vows, he instantly saw in a single moment those incalculable, unlimited, incalculable, and past buddhas in the ten directions who had entered nirvāṇa, up to the pure adornment of their bases, as clearly and distinctly as if he were examining the palm of his hand; and because of the Buddha's power, he also saw the future buddhas, world-honored ones, and pure bodhisattva lands in full adornment.

source_sentence: 爾時，不空見菩薩摩訶薩以本願力承佛威神盡見十方三世諸佛及彼佛剎清淨莊嚴已，為重宣此義，即從坐起，正持威儀，偏袒右肩，右膝著地，合掌向佛，以偈頌曰：「三千世界所有水，　　若人欲量皆可知；　調御丈夫天人師，　　戒行深遠孰能測？
translation: After he had acknowledged the Buddha's authoritative power and seen all the buddhas and their bases in the ten directions and in all their pure adornment, the Amogha-deva Bodhisattva reasserted this meaning, rose from his seat, assumed proper demeanor, bared his right shoulder, knelt on his right knee, put his palms together, and addressed the Buddha with a verse, saying, "All the waters of the 3,000 worlds can be known if one desires to measure them; who is a disciplined man, a teacher of gods and humans, or can fathom the depth of his moral conduct?

source_sentence: 須彌高廣最巍巍，　　羸老病人口吹散；　世尊初入於禪定，　　億百千劫難可了。
translation: "Sumeru is so lofty and vast and most majestic that it scatters the mouths of the weak, the elderly, and the sick; the Bhagavān first entered meditative concentration, and it's difficult to fathom for a hundred thousand eons.

source_sentence: 虛空足量能盡邊，　　四方亦可步其際；　世尊大師等正覺，　　智慧甚深無源底。
translation: Space is so full and limitless that it's possible to step beyond it in all directions; the Bhagavān's great teacher is equally enlightened, and his wisdom is so profound that it has no source or base.

source_sentence: 虛空平等無罣礙，　　可為暴風所飄動；　如來本性無煩惱，　　貪、恚、癡毒何所居？
translation: Space is equal and unobstructed, so it can be blown about by a violent wind; the Tathāgata's original nature is without affliction, so where do the poisons of greed, anger, and delusion reside?

source_sentence: 日輪圓滿處空中，　　清淨光明遍世界；　如是阿羅仙種姓，　　於此天眾而曜暉。
translation: "The full sun sits in the sky, and its pure radiance pervades the world; thus, the family of the arhats shines brightly in this multitude of celestials.

source_sentence: 又如秋月合昴宿，　　威光超世挺眾星；　如是滿月大法王，　　炎赫獨出天人上。
translation: Like the autumn moon that combines with the Pleiades, its radiance transcends the world and stands out above the stars; thus is the full-moon great king of the Dharma, whose splendor stands out above the gods and humans.

source_sentence: 若優曇華甚希有，　　時乃一遇不世出；　諸天中天調御師，　　有時而現隨意感。
translation: "If the udumbara flower is rare, then it's a rare occurrence that doesn't arise in this world; a tamer among gods, it's a timely occurrence that brings about a random sensation.

source_sentence: 世尊妙手摩我頂，　　金色百福相莊嚴，　不可毀壞悉具足，　　其為利益斯若是。
translation: The Bhagavān's marvelous hand touches my head, adorned with a hundred merits in gold, indestructible and complete, it does so for such a good cause.

source_sentence: 世尊真言及實語，　　人中法王轉正輪，　普遍十方世界中，　　甚為利益悉自在。
translation: The Bhagavān's true words and true speech, which turn the correct wheel of the Dharma king among men, pervade the worlds in ten directions, and are quite capable of producing substantial benefits.

source_sentence: 蒙世尊手摩頂時，　　我見十方最上人，　如恒河中說沙數，　　大威德仙眾多彼；　大牟尼尊手加我，　　即見諸佛如彌陀，　猶恒河中算沙數，　　人中最勝眾多彼；　如來慈手親摩覺，　　安樂世界我見知，　阿閦應供兩足尊，　　大悲光明作饒益。
translation: When I was touched by the Bhagavān's hand, I saw the greatest person in ten directions, like the number of sands in the Ganges River, the multitude of immortals of great authority; when the Bhagavān put his hand on mine, I saw buddhas like Maitreya, like the number of sands in the Ganges River, the greatest of people, the Tathāgata's compassionate hand kissing my awakening, I saw and knew the world of paradise, Akṣobhya, the two-legged honored one, and the great brightness of compassion that benefited them all.

source_sentence: 我蒙世尊神手觸，　　盡見世間滅度尊，　於一念頃如恒沙，　　大慈降伏諸根者；　世尊以手摩我時，　　亦覩彌勒昔諸願，　如彼當來一切事，　　了了明白無復疑。
translation: When the Bhagavān touched me with his divine hand, I saw the world's most reclusive honored one, who in a moment of thought is like the sands of the Ganges, whose faculties are subdued by great kindness; when the Bhagavān touched me with his hand, I also saw Maitreya's vows of yore, who fully understood and had no doubts about all the things of the future.

source_sentence: 過去諸佛我已見，　　未來、現在亦復然，　十方三世諸如來，　　神通德力難稱說。
translation: I've seen the buddhas of the past, and so it will be in the future and present, for there are tathāgatas in the ten directions and three times whose supernormal powers are difficult to describe.

source_sentence: 世尊以手摩我時，　　普見十方救世者，　并覩諸佛清淨剎，　　我因更發最上願。
translation: When the Bhagavān put his hand on me, he saw saviors in ten directions and looked at the pure bases of the buddhas, and that caused me to renew my supreme vow.

source_sentence: 諸佛神通難思議，　　戒、定、智慧亦如是，　諸餘功德不可說，　　唯願如今常教示。
translation: The buddhas' powers are unfathomable, so are their morality, meditation, and wisdom, and their other attributes are ineffable; let's hope they're always taught now.

source_sentence: 如來下手摩我時，　　即見十方諸塔廟，　眾寶金色如恒沙，　　具足種種微妙供。
translation: When the Tathāgata laid hands on me, I saw stūpas and temples in ten directions, with treasures as golden as the sands of the Ganges and an abundance of various subtle offerings.

source_sentence: 諸佛皆具大名稱，　　彼彼相好充十方，　百千樂音以供養，　　我見彼剎悉如是。
translation: The buddhas all have great names, their appearances fill ten directions, and a thousand musical sounds are offered in tribute, and I see them all in that temple.

source_sentence: 彼剎復有諸佛塔，　　金縷間錯寶頗梨，　高大過於一由旬，　　端正莊嚴皆若此。
translation: There are also stūpas and stūpas of that buddha, interspersed with gold thread and jewels, taller than a yojana, and they are all like this in their dignity and adornment.

source_sentence: 復見大尊諸塔廟，　　眾寶雜廁甚精華，　亦有住於虛空中，　　常以天華散其上。
translation: I also saw great venerable stūpas and temples, full of jewels and lavatories of the finest quality, and some standing in the sky, always with celestial flowers scattered above them.

source_sentence: 我復見彼諸勝塔，　　涌出高滿十二旬，　彼諸佛所名燈然，　　光明遍照十方剎。
translation: Again, I saw those splendid stūpas that welled up to a height of twelve decade-long, where the buddhas are called lamps that shine brightly throughout the buddhas of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 世尊以手摩頂時，　　我見妙塔不可說，　彼佛各有大名稱，　　其間皆悉如來力。
translation: When the Bhagavān touched my head with his hand, I saw marvelous stūpas that are indescribable, each with a great name, and all of them equipped with the Tathāgata's power.

source_sentence: 世尊手摩我頂時，　　於是得見諸佛剎，　彼或燒身、或受辱，　　種種行類不可宣，　各於自剎修苦行，　　無有晝夜如救然，　勇猛弘誓度眾生，　　皆為無上菩提故。
translation: When the Bhagavān touched my head with his hand, I was able to see buddha bases that sometimes burn themselves or are humiliated, whose various deeds cannot be explained, each cultivating ascetic practices in its own blaze, with no day or night like salvation, and which courageously and boldly vow to save sentient beings, all for the sake of unsurpassed bodhi.

source_sentence: 我又覩見十方剎，　　有諸菩薩常辛勤，　自剜身肉然多燈，　　彼為菩提光明故。
translation: I've also seen bodhisattvas in bases in ten directions who are constantly striving, plucking out their own flesh and making it abundantly bright, because it's for the light of bodhi.

source_sentence: 我又復見清淨身，　　於諸佛前常立住，　至彼世尊涅槃已，　　為求菩提大德故。
translation: Again, I've seen pure bodies that stand before the buddhas until the Bhagavān's nirvāṇa, because they seek the great virtue of bodhi.

source_sentence: 我又復見為法人，　　香油灌身然燈炬，　苦身精意遍十方，　　終不繫心財食類。
translation: Again, I've seen artificial men, whose bodies are filled with perfumed oil and burned with lamps, whose bodies are pained and whose intentions are focused in ten directions, and whose minds are never tethered to wealth and food.

source_sentence: 我又更見諸丈夫，　　恒捨頭、目、及身、手、　妻子、王位、與國城，　　志令群生獲安樂。
translation: I've also seen husbands who constantly abandon their heads, eyes, bodies, hands, wives, kingly positions, and cities with the intention of bringing well-being to all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 如我所見無遺餘，　　不可口言而宣說，　我所知見最勝等，　　蒙佛威靈故遍觀。
translation: As I've seen, there's nothing left to declare without using unkind words, and I've seen the most remarkable things I know, which I've pervasively observed because of the Buddha's authoritative power.

source_sentence: 世尊威神加持故，　　令我見斯希有事，　吉祥第一天中天，　　我今歸依最無上。」
translation: Because of the Bhagavān's authoritative power and spiritual support, I've been shown this rare thing, which is auspicious on the first heaven, and I now take refuge in the most unsurpassed."

source_sentence: 菩薩念佛三昧分見無邊佛廣請問品第八爾時，不空見菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the bodhisattva Nianfo sanmei fraction saw the Infinite Buddha's extensive questioning class number eight, and the nonempty-eyed bodhisattva Mahāsattva said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 今此一切天人大眾，既見世尊久處禪定、默無言說，咸生渴仰，唯願世尊俯就斯座。」
translation: Now, all these celestials and great multitudes of people who have seen the Bhagavān in meditation for so long and who have remained silent have become eager and longing for him, so they would like the Bhagavān to stoop to this seat."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊聞不空見菩薩摩訶薩為彼天人大眾請已，端身正念，默然許之。
translation: After hearing that the Bhagavān had asked the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva to sit for that great multitude of gods, the Bhagavān assumed proper form and mindfulness and quietly gave his approval.

source_sentence: 爾時，不空見菩薩既蒙默許，偏袒右臂，右膝著地，合掌向佛，復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Having then received this silent approval, the Bhagavān addressed the Buddha with his right arm bared, his right knee on the ground, his palms together, and his face to the Buddha, and said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今欲問，若聖聽者乃敢發言。」
translation: Now, I want to ask a question, but if a noble person listens, then I dare to speak."

source_sentence: 佛告不空見：「如來、應供、等正覺隨汝所問，當為汝說，斷汝所疑，令爾心喜，然是天、人、梵、魔、沙門、婆羅門等皆當證知。」
translation: The Buddha told Bukongjian, "The Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One will follow your questions and explain them for you, ending your doubts and causing your heart to rejoice, for then gods, humans, Brahmā, Māra, ascetics, priests, and so forth will all realize them."

source_sentence: 時不空見菩薩摩訶薩承佛教已，即便白言：「世尊！
translation: After he had been taught, the nonempty-eyed bodhisattva Mahāsattva replied, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩應當思惟何等三昧？
translation: What kind of samādhi should bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas contemplate?

source_sentence: 應當親近何等三昧？
translation: What kind of samādhi should one approach?

source_sentence: 應當修行何等三昧？
translation: What kind of samādhi should be cultivated?

source_sentence: 如是，菩薩思惟、親近、及以修行此三昧已，現見何法而得安樂？
translation: Thus, after contemplating, intimately associating with, and practicing this concentration, what do bodhisattvas see now that brings about well-being?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大海，多聞受故？
translation: How will it be like the ocean, because it's heard and experienced so much?

source_sentence: 云何當得如須彌山，菩提心安住不傾故？
translation: "How will it be like Mount Sumeru, because the mind of enlightenment is stably anchored and doesn't tilt?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大鐵圍山，一切外道邪論不能動故？
translation: How will it be like a great ring of iron that cannot be moved by all the mistaken theories of non-Buddhists?

source_sentence: 云何當得如虛空，一切法無礙故？
translation: "How will it be like space, since all dharmas are unobstructed?

source_sentence: 云何當得如虛空，心無染著故？
translation: "How will it be like space, because the mind is free of defiled attachment?

source_sentence: 云何當得如日輪，破除一切無明闇故？
translation: How will it be like the sun-wheel, which destroys all the darkness of ignorance?

source_sentence: 云何當得如月輪，白淨法圓滿故？
translation: "How will it be like the moon, when the white pure dharma is perfected?

source_sentence: 云何當得如燈輪，作法光明故？
translation: "How will it be like a wheel of lamps that produces the light of the Dharma?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大炬，一切受陰滅故？
translation: "How will it be like a great torch, because all acquired aggregates cease?

source_sentence: 云何當得如火聚，焚燒一切諸煩惱故？
translation: "How will it be like a cluster of fires that burns up all the afflictions?

source_sentence: 云何當得如河、池、泉源，一切眾生隨意受用故？
translation: "How will it be like a river, a pond, or a spring that all sentient beings enjoy at will?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大船，一切眾生度彼岸故？
translation: "How will it be like a great ship in which all sentient beings cross to the other shore?

source_sentence: 云何當得如橋梁，不沒生死煩惱中故？
translation: "How will it be like a bridge that doesn't get lost in the afflictions of birth-and-death?

source_sentence: 云何當得降伏眾敵，破壞魔軍諸憍慢故？
translation: How will it be possible to subdue many enemies and destroy the pride of Māra's army?

source_sentence: 云何當得如波利質多羅樹，為一切諸方所有眾生開七菩提華，香風普熏故？
translation: "How will it be like the pārijātaka tree, which opens seven flowers of enlightenment for all sentient beings in all directions and is universally perfumed by fragrant air?

source_sentence: 云何當得如優曇鉢華，希有難得故？
translation: "How will it be like the udumbara flower, which is rare and difficult to obtain?

source_sentence: 云何當得如藥王，等療一切眾生病苦故？
translation: How will it be like the Medicine King, which cures all illnesses and pains equally?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大醫王，起大悲心愍痛眾生故？
translation: "How will it be possible to be like the great king of doctors, who arouses great compassion for the pain of sentient beings?

source_sentence: 云何當得如栴檀樹，除眾熱惱作清涼故？
translation: "How will it be like a sandalwood tree that removes the many hazards and makes them cool?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大雲雨，等注法雨令滿足故？
translation: "How will it be like a great cloud of rain, which causes the fulfillment of the Dharma rain of equal injection?

source_sentence: 云何當得如蜜器，能具足說一味法故？
translation: "How can a vessel like honey be fully capable of teaching a single flavor of the Dharma?

source_sentence: 云何當得如師子吼，能與一切眾生無怖畏故？
translation: "How will you attain the ability to roar like a lion, which is able to give all sentient beings no fear?

source_sentence: 云何當得如父母，等與一切眾生安樂利益故？
translation: "How will you attain the well-being and benefit of all sentient beings, just as parents do?

source_sentence: 云何當得見真法，至如、法性、實際彼岸故？
translation: How will one see the true teaching, which reaches the other shore of suchness, Dharma nature, and reality?

source_sentence: 云何當得解釋深趣，至實義彼岸故？
translation: How will it be possible to explain the profound aim and reach the other shore of true meaning?

source_sentence: 云何當得巧說法辯，至能分別彼岸故？
translation: How will it be possible to skillfully explain the eloquence of the teaching, so that it can discern the other shore?

source_sentence: 云何當得善巧說法，至具足方便彼岸故？
translation: How will the teaching be skillfully delivered, so that it reaches the other shore of perfect skillful means?

source_sentence: 云何當得分別了義，善知字句法故？
translation: How should you understand the meaning of words and phrases well in order to discern their meaning?

source_sentence: 云何當得正意、正行，具知足故？
translation: How can right intention and right action be attained and fully known?

source_sentence: 云何當得統御大眾，無所畏故？
translation: How will you be able to control the masses and have no fear?

source_sentence: 云何當得說如實義，入實際故？
translation: How will it be possible to explain the true meaning and enter into the actuality?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大海，一切法同一味故？
translation: How can it be like the ocean, when all things are of the same taste?

source_sentence: 云何當得如大山，三昧安靜無能動搖故？
translation: How will it be attained like a great mountain, because samādhi is calm and unshakeable?

source_sentence: 云何當得如門闑(亦云帝釋幢也)，菩提心不可動轉故？
translation: How will it be like the entrance way (also called the banner of Indra), because the mind of enlightenment is immovable?

source_sentence: 云何當得堅固力，心志具故？
translation: How will it become resolute, given the strength of mind and will?

source_sentence: 云何當得具足威儀，不作虛諂故？
translation: How will it be possible to have perfect deportment and not deceive?

source_sentence: 云何當得端正身，為他歡喜說法故？
translation: "How will you attain a correct body that rejoices others and explains the teaching?

source_sentence: 云何當得最妙，最上色相故？
translation: How did you attain the most sublime and most superior form?

source_sentence: 云何當得尊貴，大姓家生故？
translation: How will it be honored, because it's born in a family of great lineage?

source_sentence: 云何當得大法王，福報功德故？
translation: "How will the great king of the Dharma be attained because of the merits and virtues that he will receive?

source_sentence: 云何當得具足無量辯才故？
translation: "How will it be possible to have immeasurable eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得不取著辯才故？
translation: How can one attain freedom from attachment to discernment?

source_sentence: 云何當得不錯辯才故？
translation: How will it be possible to attain the talent of good eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得分別種種名字句辯才故？
translation: "How can you discern the eloquence of various names and phrases?

source_sentence: 云何當得不思議辯才故？
translation: How will it be possible because of inconceivable eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得無邊辯才故？
translation: How will limitless eloquence be attained?

source_sentence: 云何當得解脫辯才故？
translation: "How will one attain the eloquence of liberation?

source_sentence: 云何當得同義(亦云成就也)辯才故？
translation: "How will the same meaning (also called accomplishment) be attained through eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得隨他意義辯才故？
translation: "How will it be possible to follow the eloquence of other interpretations?

source_sentence: 云何當得漸親近辯才故？
translation: How will it be possible to become progressively more intimate with the eloquence of the speaker?

source_sentence: 云何當得所問能答辯才故？
translation: "How will the ability to answer questions be attained because of its eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得無問自說辯才故？
translation: How will it be possible to speak eloquently on one's own without asking questions?

source_sentence: 云何當得不毀壞辯才故？
translation: How will it be attained without destroying eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得無退轉辯才故？
translation: How will it be possible to attain irreversible eloquence?

source_sentence: 云何當得甚深句字種種說辯才故？
translation: "How will you attain the profound ability to explain various words and phrases eloquently?

source_sentence: 云何當得無量無邊譬況辯才故？
translation: How will it be possible to attain the eloquence of measureless and limitless metaphors?

source_sentence: 云何當得未證大菩提已能具足梵音聲故？
translation: "How will it be possible to perfect the sound of the Brahma voice before realizing great bodhi?

source_sentence: 云何當得第一微妙音聲故？
translation: "How will the first subtle sound be obtained?

source_sentence: 云何當得迦陵頻伽音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of the kalaviṅka be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得師子王音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of the lion king be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得大龍王音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of the great dragon king be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得大牛王音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of the great bull king be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得大鍾鼓音聲故？
translation: How will the sound of a great bell and drum be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得勝妙歌讚音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of wonderful songs and praises be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得樂絃音聲故？
translation: How will the sound of strings of music be enjoyed?

source_sentence: 云何當得哀婉清美音聲故？
translation: "How will a gentle, clear, and beautiful sound be obtained?

source_sentence: 云何當得風雲雷震音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of wind, clouds, and thunder tremble be heard?

source_sentence: 云何當得甚深莊嚴辯才音聲故？
translation: "How will the sound of the Vairocana adornata eloquence be obtained?

source_sentence: 云何當得諸妙語言、文字、章句真正莊嚴辯才音聲故？
translation: "How will you attain the truly ornate, eloquent sounds and voices of wonderful words, letters, and phrases?

source_sentence: 云何當得甚深能大巧說音聲故？
translation: How will the profound ability to skillfully expound sounds be attained?

source_sentence: 云何當得種種譬喻辯才音聲故？
translation: "How will the various metaphors, eloquence, and sounds be obtained?

source_sentence: 云何當得一切世間最勝供養音聲故？
translation: "How will the most excellent sound of offerings in the world be obtained?

source_sentence: 云何當得共他論義辯才音聲故？
translation: How will it be possible to share the eloquence of the meanings of other treatises and the sounds?

source_sentence: 云何當得神通彼岸音聲故？
translation: "How will the supernormal power of sound on the other side be attained?

source_sentence: 云何當得不忘失法音聲故？
translation: How will it be possible to hear the sound of the Dharma without forgetting it?

source_sentence: 云何當得不缺少善法音聲故？
translation: How will it be possible not to lack the sound of the good Dharma?

source_sentence: 云何當得諸善根行具足他讚音聲故？
translation: "How will the practice of good roots become complete when accompanied by the sounds of praise from others?

source_sentence: 如是，一切悉皆具足。」
translation: Thus, all of them are fully present."

source_sentence: 爾時，不空見菩薩摩訶薩發如是等諸疑問已，為重宣此義，以偈問曰：「具足金色百福相，　　能覺一法利無邊，　最勝功德我今問，　　何等三昧先應思？
translation: Seeing these kinds of questions from the bodhisattva Mahāsattva, Bukong then repeatedly explained their meaning in a verse, asking, "Are they replete with the marks of a hundred golden merits, able to realize the limitless benefits of a single dharma, and the most excellent qualities I've ever asked, which samādhi should I first consider?

source_sentence: 如來妙智無等倫，　　世間寧有加上者？
translation: "The Tathāgata's marvelous wisdom has no equal, how could there be anyone in the world who compares to it?

source_sentence: 我今請尊修何定，　　所獲功德不思議？
translation: "Now, what concentration have I asked the venerable to cultivate that has gained unfathomable merit?

source_sentence: 天人大師上調御！
translation: Deva Nāgârjuna, the great master of the gods, is in control!

source_sentence: 思惟是定何功德？
translation: What is the merit of thinking about this concentration?

source_sentence: 菩薩於此云何修，　　而能安樂於一切？
translation: How does a bodhisattva cultivate this, so that he can be comfortable with all things?

source_sentence: 云何自然多聞海？
translation: "What is the ocean of natural learning?

source_sentence: 云何守護決定心，　得住諸佛功德處？
translation: "How does guarding a mind of determined concentration allow one to abide in the meritorious position of the buddhas?

source_sentence: 云何如大鐵圍山，　是中都無恚恨心，　　而能降伏諸外道？
translation: "How is it like a great ring of iron mountains, in which there's no ill will and hatred, but it's possible to subdue non-Buddhists?

source_sentence: 云何無礙如虛空？
translation: "How is it unobstructed like space?

source_sentence: 云何復得心自在？
translation: How can the mind again attain mastery?

source_sentence: 云何如日復如月？
translation: "How is it like the sun and again like the moon?

source_sentence: 云何同炬亦如燈？
translation: How is the same torch like a lamp?

source_sentence: 云何為眾作光明？
translation: "What is the light created for the multitude?

source_sentence: 云何復須觀三昧？
translation: How is it again necessary to observe samādhi?

source_sentence: 云何解脫諸煩惱？
translation: How are the afflictions liberated?

source_sentence: 云何能度生死岸？
translation: How can we cross the shore of birth and death?

source_sentence: 云何發心苦輪中，　　獨超三界無與等？
translation: "How does the arousal of the intention to enter the wheel of suffering transcend the three realms alone, without equal?

source_sentence: 云何波利質多樹，　　大人相好妙莊嚴？
translation: "What is the marvelous adornment of the great man's appearance, the pārijāta tree?

source_sentence: 云何如彼優曇華，　　勇健雄猛不出世？
translation: "How is it that the udumbara flower is so vigorous and majestic that it doesn't appear in the world?

source_sentence: 云何施藥不望報、　　良醫救苦調御師，　能除眾生諸熱病，　　安住淨戒得清涼？
translation: "How does a good doctor save sentient beings from feverish illnesses and attain coolness by abiding in pure morality, without expecting reward when bestowing medicine?

source_sentence: 云何當得如法寶，　　無量功德度彼岸？
translation: "How will you attain this treasure of the Dharma, which has measureless merit and reaches the other shore?

source_sentence: 云何甚深微妙法，　　猶蜜甜味妙無加？
translation: "How is the teaching so profound and subtle that it's like the sweet taste of honey, marvelous and uncommon?

source_sentence: 云何得此師子音，　　能令眾生無怖畏？
translation: "How can this lion's voice be heard, which causes sentient beings to have no fear?

source_sentence: 云何等益如父母，　　得彼深樂不思議？
translation: "How do you attain the profound joy of not contemplating such benefits as those of a father and mother?

source_sentence: 云何能得妙辯才，　　行於菩提大名稱？
translation: "How can one attain marvelous eloquence and practice the great name of enlightenment?

source_sentence: 云何說彼最勝道？
translation: How do you explain this most excellent path?

source_sentence: 云何而得無礙智？
translation: How can we attain unobstructed cognition?

source_sentence: 云何於義能巧便？
translation: How can the meaning be skillfully facilitated?

source_sentence: 云何妙知諸法相？
translation: How do we know the marvelous characteristics of dharmas?

source_sentence: 云何分別名句身？
translation: What is the body that discerns names and phrases?

source_sentence: 云何世法及出世？
translation: What are mundane dharmas and transmundane dharmas?

source_sentence: 云何正念與正行？
translation: What are right mindfulness and right action?

source_sentence: 云何知足具思惟？
translation: "How is the contemplation of knowing enough?

source_sentence: 云何多聞如大海？
translation: How is it that much learning is like a great ocean?

source_sentence: 云何歎佛真實德？
translation: "How do you praise the true merits of the Buddha?

source_sentence: 云何說彼諸眾生，　　生死根本如實際？
translation: How do you explain that the root of birth-and-death in these sentient beings is as it really is?

source_sentence: 云何諸法無差別，　　猶如大海同一醎？
translation: "How are all dharmas nondistinct, like the ocean being uniformly turbid?

source_sentence: 云何如山定無動，　　不退轉心如門闑？
translation: "How is a mountain concentration like motionlessness, and a nonretrogressing mind like a doorway?

source_sentence: 云何一心無餘業，　　但求無上大菩提？
translation: "How is there single-mindedness and no remaining activity, but rather the pursuit of the unsurpassed great enlightenment?

source_sentence: 云何具足諸威儀，　　身相端嚴見者喜？
translation: "How are the various ways of being perfected and the dignity of their appearance pleasing to those who see them?

source_sentence: 云何常生大姓家，　　亦受法王大福聚？
translation: How are you always born into a great family and receive the great stock of merit of the Dharma king?

source_sentence: 云何得彼無量辯，　　所有言論世莫思？
translation: How can one obtain their immeasurable eloquence, which is unthinkable in this world of discourse?

source_sentence: 云何字句義深微？
translation: How profound are the meanings of words and phrases?

source_sentence: 我今請問護世者。
translation: "Now, I'd like to ask the world protector.

source_sentence: 云何無上難得勝，　　親近真辯無遺忘？
translation: "How is it that unsurpassed, difficult to attain, and that true eloquence is not forgotten when approached?

source_sentence: 云何同義稱根性，　　若問、不問斯相應？
translation: "What is the synonymous term for the nature of the faculties that are associated with asking and not asking?

source_sentence: 云何未證具梵音，　　其聲清婉甚微妙，　迦陵頻伽聲可愛，　　大智雄猛聲遠聞？
translation: "How is the voice of a Brahmin who has yet to realize the full range of Sanskrit sounds, whose sound is so pure and gentle and subtle that the voice of the Kaliṅga is desirable and the voice of great wisdom is majestic and distantly heard?

source_sentence: 云何師子、大龍音，　　更得深重牛王吼？
translation: "How did the lion, the great dragon voice, attain another profound roar from the bull king?

source_sentence: 云何世尊得絃樂，　　具足種種諸器聲？
translation: "How did the Bhagavān attain the joy of being fully endowed with the sounds of various instruments?

source_sentence: 云何獲彼甜味音，　　而常演說眾欣樂？
translation: How do you get that sweet-smelling sound and always expound it to the delight of all?

source_sentence: 云何功德音無毀，　　其出如風若震雷？
translation: "What is the meritorious sound that is not destructive and whose emission is like a wind that shakes a thunderbolt?

source_sentence: 云何多種譬喻音，　　能宣甚深諸言說？
translation: "What are the many metaphorical sounds that convey profound statements?

source_sentence: 云何所出善語音？
translation: What is the sound of good speech that arises?

source_sentence: 云何諸法不忘失？
translation: How are the dharmas not forgotten?

source_sentence: 云何有中獲宿命？
translation: How is there a middle way to obtain a predestination?

source_sentence: 彼諸神通云何修？
translation: How are these powers cultivated?

source_sentence: 云何修行無疲倦，　　遍知一切諸善法？
translation: How does one cultivate unwearying practice and have universal knowledge of all good qualities?

source_sentence: 如是諸法不思議，　　自然輪轉遍十方，　世尊！
translation: Such dharmas are inconceivable and naturally occur throughout the ten directions, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我皆無復疑，　　是故今問歸依處。」
translation: I have no further doubt about any of this, so now I'm asking about a place to turn to."

source_sentence: 爾時，不空見菩薩摩訶薩慇懃鄭重如是問已，即以神力身昇虛空，於虛空中自然化作天寶華蓋，莊嚴微妙，七寶所成——謂金、銀、琉璃、頗梨、馬瑙、車璩、真珠——具如是等種種寶飾。
translation: After Bukong saw that the bodhisattva Mahāsattva had respectfully and solemnly asked this question, he ascended into space with supernormal powers and naturally transformed himself into a heavenly jeweled floral canopy in space, adorned with subtlety and made of seven treasures - gold, silver, beryl, bāli, cornelian, chakra, and genuine pearls - that were decorated with such and such treasures.

source_sentence: 彼寶蓋中雨種種華，而彼眾華右遶三匝住佛頂上，即彼華中以偈歎曰：「歸命丈夫大調御，　　無上正覺兩足尊，　一切世間天人輩，　　寧有可以比類者？
translation: From that jeweled canopy, it rained down a variety of flowers, and those flowers circled three times to the right and stood on top of the Buddha's head, whereupon they praised him in verse, "A venerable man of great control, the unsurpassed, perfectly enlightened, and two-legged honored one, how could there be anyone comparable to the whole worldly celestial family?

source_sentence: 長夜黑暗諸眾生，　　愚癡顛倒墮邪道；　極尊明智世間眼，　　能令還復平正路。
translation: "For a long time, darkness has kept sentient beings foolish and mistaken, and they've fallen into a wrong path; the Bhagavān's wise worldly eye can restore them to the straight and level path.

source_sentence: 失於清白法種子，　　眾生煩惱內燒心；　勝尊猶如世父母，　　能令安止白法處。
translation: Losing the seeds of pure dharmas and the minds of sentient beings with internal afflictions, the most venerable is like a worldly parent who can make them rest in the place of pure dharmas.

source_sentence: 遺喪善法深利人，　　後世方將可怖畏，　最尊成就大慈行，　　為諸眾生真導師。
translation: Losing the profound benefits of good qualities that will terrify people in later lifetimes, the most honored accomplishes great acts of kindness and is a true guide for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 一切眾生無善利、　　無有覆護、無救者，　希有大悲教世師，　　世尊真為作救護。」
translation: All sentient beings lack good benefits, have nothing to protect, and have no one to rescue, so it's rare to find a greatly compassionate teacher of the world who truly works to rescue the Bhagavān."

source_sentence: 爾時，華中說是偈已，彼華方至如來足上，須臾即飛，遍往三千大千世界遍諸佛前施散供養。
translation: After this verse was spoken in the flower, the flower then reached the Tathāgata's feet and in a moment flew off, traveling throughout the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds to scatter offerings to all the buddhas.

source_sentence: 彼寶蓋中復出栴檀末團大如車輪，至如來身忽然不現，而彼栴檀香氣微妙，充滿三千大千世界。
translation: Out of that jeweled lid again came a ball of sandalwood as large as a chariot wheel that suddenly disappeared into the Tathāgata's body, but the fragrance of that sandalwood was so subtle that it filled the 3,000 great thousand worlds.

source_sentence: 所有眾生得聞此香皆悉受於上妙快樂，猶如菩薩入第四禪。
translation: All sentient beings who hear this fragrance experience the most sublime happiness, just like a bodhisattva entering the fourth dhyāna.

source_sentence: 爾時，不空見菩薩摩訶薩示現如是神通事已，即白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After seeing the bodhisattva Mahāsattva demonstrate this kind of superb performance, Bukong then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩摩訶薩等，云何當得如斯智慧——所謂大智慧、速疾智慧、機捷智慧、猛利智慧、無相智慧、巧入智慧、甚深智慧、廣普智慧、無畏智慧、圓滿智慧？
translation: How will these bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others attain such wisdom-such as great wisdom, quick wisdom, expedient wisdom, vigorous wisdom, markless wisdom, skillful entry wisdom, profound wisdom, extensive and universal wisdom, fearless wisdom, and perfect wisdom?

source_sentence: 云何復得不可算數不可稱量諸妙善根——所謂：心如金剛善根，穿徹一切法故；心如迦隣提衣柔軟善根，能作業故；心如大海善根，攝諸戒聚故；心如平石善根，住持一切事業故；心如山王善根，發生一切善法故；心如大地善根，負持眾生事業故；得心不隨他行善根，遠離非法教誨故；得心善修行善根，一切法安住故；得不壞信善根，於諸如來所行之處不疑惑故，住一世界自然遍見十方諸佛、亦聞彼佛宣說妙法，復見菩薩聲聞大眾，又覩佛剎清淨莊嚴，受用等事悉無疑故；乃至攝受決定善根，於一切時自利利他故。
translation: 云何復得不可算數不可稱量諸妙善根——所謂：心如金剛善根，穿徹一切法故；心如迦隣提衣柔軟善根，能作業故；心如大海善根，攝諸戒聚故；心如平石善根，住持一切事業故；心如山王善根，發生一切善法故；心如大地善根，負持眾生事業故；得心不隨他行善根，遠離非法教誨故；得心善修行善根，一切法安住故；得不壞信善根，於諸如來所行之處不疑惑故，住一世界自然遍見十方諸佛、亦聞彼佛宣說妙法，復見菩薩聲聞大眾，又覩佛剎清淨莊嚴，受用等事悉無疑故；乃至攝受決定善根，於一切時自利利他故。

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如我今者，實為自利、復欲利益諸眾生故，請問如來也。
translation: Now, I really want to benefit myself and want to benefit other sentient beings, so I'd like to ask the Tathāgata about it.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今復為弘廣眾生淨信心故，請問如來也。
translation: "Now, I'd like to ask the Tathāgata again, in order to promote the pure faith of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今復為彼諸菩薩摩訶薩輩具足圓滿不思議善根故，請問如來也。
translation: "Now, I'd like to ask the Tathāgata again because that group of bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas has perfected the full range of inconceivable wholesome roots.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我復為斯被大精進弘誓鎧甲諸大菩薩摩訶薩故，請問如來也。
translation: "Again, I'd like to ask the Tathāgata about these great bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who are armored by the great effort and great vow.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 有諸菩薩摩訶薩輩於生死中發大精進，為一切眾生而亦不取眾生之相，然是菩薩摩訶薩雖於生死煩惱中長夜度脫一切眾生，而實不住生死煩惱想。
translation: "Are there a group of bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, who make great effort in the midst of birth-and-death and don't grasp the characteristics of sentient beings for the sake of all sentient beings, yet this is a bodhisattva, though he spends a long time liberating all sentient beings from the afflictions of birth-and-death, he really doesn't abide in the contemplation of the afflictions of birth-and-death?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為如是諸眾生故，請問如來也。
translation: "For the sake of such sentient beings, I'd like to ask the Tathāgata about this.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 有諸菩薩摩訶薩等行慈悲時，於諸眾生都無瞋恨。
translation: "When bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others practice compassion, they don't hold grudges against sentient beings.

source_sentence: 設諸眾生訶責、罵辱、楚撻、撾打種種苦迫，如是菩薩於眾生所終無報答，乃至不起嫌心、不失本願、無異分別及餘思惟，一心修行大慈大悲。
translation: Even if sentient beings are scolded, insulted, chastised, and beaten with various kinds of pain, such a bodhisattva never repays those sentient beings, doesn't become hostile, doesn't lose his original vow, doesn't discriminate differently, doesn't contemplate otherwise, and single-mindedly cultivates great kindness and compassion.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為如是住於大乘諸菩薩故，請問如來也。
translation: I've asked the Tathāgata about this because I'm thus abiding among the great vehicle bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 有諸菩薩摩訶薩輩為眾生故，欲捨己樂及諸樂具、欲受一切熾然大苦，發如斯念：『我當云何令一切眾生得最勝樂、令一切眾生得大法明？』
translation: For the sake of sentient beings, some members of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva community want to abandon their own pleasures and implements of pleasure and want to experience all blazing great suffering, and they think, 'How will I cause all sentient beings to attain the most excellent happiness and cause all sentient beings to attain great knowledge of the Dharma?'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩如是念時，凡所有物——若內、若外——無不施者、無不益者、無不饒者。
translation: When those bodhisattvas thus think, there's nothing they don't give, nothing they don't benefit, and nothing they don't spare.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為如斯諸菩薩故，請問如來也。
translation: It's because of these bodhisattvas that I've asked the Tathāgata about this.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 有諸菩薩摩訶薩輩被著如是精進鎧時，發如斯念：『我今當應為一一眾生於恒河沙劫住大地獄、受諸苦惱，猶入出息，不以為苦亦不退沒菩提之心。』
translation: When the bodhisattva-mahāsattva community is clad in the armor of such exertion, they think, 'Now, I will stand up for each and every sentient being in the great hells of the Ganges River eon and experience suffering and distress while still entering and exiting, not thinking that it's painful or that I'm abandoning the mind of enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我復為是諸菩薩故，請問如來也。
translation: "Again, it's because of these bodhisattvas that I'd like to ask the Tathāgata about this.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 有諸菩薩摩訶薩輩被著如是精進鎧已，發如斯念：『我今當為一切眾生執諸事業、廝役服勤，種種承事不以為苦。
translation: After they put on the armor of such exertion, the group of bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas thinks, 'Now, I will perform various tasks for all sentient beings, serve them as servants, and undertake various tasks that won't be considered painful.'

source_sentence: 於是，或為奴婢、或為僕隷、或為儐從、或為弟子。
translation: As a result, I might be a slave, a servant, a bushel, or a disciple.

source_sentence: 我應如是，乃至為作種種眷屬成熟眾生。』
translation: Thus, I should do this, even to the point of creating various dependents to ripen sentient beings.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我復為是諸菩薩故，請問如來也。
translation: "Again, it's because of these bodhisattvas that I'd like to ask the Tathāgata about this.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 有諸菩薩摩訶薩輩為一切眾生故，發大勇猛，修諸苦行，捨身、手、足、頭、目、髓、腦，或時節節支解其形、析骨消髓，不以為苦、無有休懈，方更熾然於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提事。
translation: "For the sake of all sentient beings, there are the bodhisattva-mahāsattva group who muster great courage and cultivate austerities, abandoning body, hands, feet, head, eyes, marrow, and brain, sometimes dismembering their bodies section by section, cutting away bones and marrow, not accepting it as painful, and having no laziness before they can become more enthused about the task of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為如斯諸菩薩故，請世尊耳。」
translation: It's for such bodhisattvas that I've asked the Bhagavān to listen."

source_sentence: 爾時，不空見菩薩摩訶薩如是問已，為重宣此義，以偈頌曰：「我問天師諸勝智，　　大智彼等云何成？
translation: Seeing this question from the bodhisattva Mahāsattva, Bukong then repeatedly explained its meaning in a verse, "I've asked the celestial masters about their excellent cognition, 'What does that great cognition accomplish?'

source_sentence: 云何速智及捷疾，　　利智聰明能通達？
translation: "How are speedy knowledge and quick wit, sharp knowledge and intelligence able to penetrate?

source_sentence: 何因得彼甚深智？
translation: What is the cause for attaining this profound knowledge?

source_sentence: 盡無邊智為我宣，　弘廣普遍一切智，　　是為最勝求菩提。
translation: Exhausting limitless knowledge and proclaiming it for me, spreading and universally understanding everything, is the most excellent way to pursue bodhi.

source_sentence: 云何當得無怖畏？
translation: How will I attain fearlessness?

source_sentence: 具足善巧為我說。
translation: "Possessing skillful means, he explains it for me.

source_sentence: 云何而得金剛心，　　一切法中無疑惑？
translation: "How did you attain the adamantine mind, which has no doubt about any of the teachings?

source_sentence: 云何得是柔軟心，　　戒行清明淨如海？
translation: "How can this gentle mind attain a moral practice as clear and pure as the ocean?

source_sentence: 云何如山不動轉，　　菩提決定願莊嚴？
translation: "How is it that a mountain doesn't budge and that the bodhisattva's determined vow is adorned?

source_sentence: 云何行行不隨他，　　於義明了得安住？
translation: "How do you practice and conduct yourself in a way that doesn't follow others and attain stability in the understanding of meaning?

source_sentence: 云何而得不壞信，　　諸佛所作無復疑？
translation: How can we attain indestructible faith, having no further doubt about what the buddhas have done?

source_sentence: 云何得彼生念智，　　住於一界現十方，　遍覩諸佛及聞法，　　并大集眾亦明了？
translation: "How can they attain the knowledge of mindfulness of birth, abide in one realm and manifest in ten directions, universally observe the buddhas and hear the Dharma, and comprehend the great assembly of people?

source_sentence: 其身不離於一剎，　　而能供養十方尊，　妙華、眾香及塗香，　　諸餘眾具難可說；　心住此剎無他緣，　　身現十方無量土，　親承奉事彼諸佛，　　悉由神通力無邊。
translation: That person doesn't part from a single moment, but they're able to offer offerings to the honored ones in ten directions, with marvelous flowers, multitudes of fragrances, and smeared incense, the rest of which are indescribable; they mentally abide in this moment without other objects, their body manifests in measureless lands in ten directions, and they personally serve the buddhas, all because of their limitless supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 無請我今為行慈，　　住於慚愧修行者，　不自利己常益他，　　為斯我請大名稱。
translation: Now, I'm uninvited to practice kindness, abide in modest cultivation, don't benefit myself but always benefit others, and invoke a great name for this self.

source_sentence: 諸有發心求佛智，　　善根成熟不思議，　如是三昧云何修？
translation: "Are there people who arouse the intention to seek the Buddha's wisdom, whose wholesome roots are ripened beyond deliberation, and who thus cultivate samādhi?

source_sentence: 我故為彼問無著。
translation: "I therefore ask Arhat for him.

source_sentence: 被此忍鎧為眾生：　　『我要當拔諸重苦。』
translation: They wear this armor of forbearance for sentient beings, 'I will remove the heavy suffering.'

source_sentence: 彼等已離眾生想，　　為斯故問正覺真。
translation: They've parted with the conception of sentient beings, so they're asking about the truth of right awakening.

source_sentence: 彼輩常住平等心，　　觀察眾生無異想，　常能成就慈悲者，　　我為彼故問如來。
translation: 'They always abide in an equal mind, observe that sentient beings have no different conceptions, and are always capable of accomplishing compassion, so for their sake I'm asking the Tathāgata.'

source_sentence: 是中應行何等法，　　速得如是不思議，　所得功德無有邊？
translation: 'What teaching should be practiced here that's quickly attained like this without deliberation, and the merit attained has no limit?'

source_sentence: 我為彼故請調御。
translation: "For their sake, I'll ask that they be disciplined.

source_sentence: 被弘誓鎧勇猛人，　　為一眾生恒沙劫，　大地獄中受焰苦，　　善哉安樂諸眾生。
translation: A brave man wearing a great vow and armor serves one sentient being for an eon, suffering from the flames of a great hell, and it's good to comfort sentient beings.

source_sentence: 彼等無睡亦無疲，　　內外諸物無不施，　如是攝受眾生者，　　我今為彼問普觀。
translation: They don't sleep or grow weary, and they don't give anything inside or outside that isn't given.

source_sentence: 呵責、毀辱、及捶罵，　　身受煎迫眾事苦，　為他奴婢及僕隸，　　皆由斯輩請世尊。
translation: They are rebuked, insulted, and scolded, suffer physical hardships, and become the slaves and servants of others, and it's because of these people that they ask the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 無量百千數億頭，　　有來求索皆能捨，　當捨頭時極歡喜，　　為求無上妙菩提；　為諸眾生而更捨，　　手、足、及以身餘肢，　救解失道眾生類，　　除撥生死還正路；　又施妻妾及男女，　　七寶、珠玉、及金、銀，　亦捨上妙眾器具，　　我為彼故問如來。
translation: They abandon their heads for the sake of the unsurpassed, wonderful bodhi. They abandon their hands, feet, and other limbs for the sake of sentient beings, saving sentient beings who have lost their way and returning to the right path after birth-and-death; they also give wives, concubines, men, and women, seven treasures, jewelry, gold, and silver, and abandon the most marvelous implements.

source_sentence: 捨身命財無厭倦，　　長夜聽說不疲勞，　心常寂滅行頭陀，　　我以彼故問正覺。
translation: He gives up his body, his life, and his possessions without tire, listens to lectures long into the night without tiring, and practices the ascetic practice of eternal tranquility in his mind; it's for that reason that I've asked the right awakening.

source_sentence: 真實妙語恒繫心，　　麁鄙惡言聞即離，　而於他所無嫌恨，　　我緣彼故諮自在。
translation: His true and wonderful words are always bound to his mind, his vulgar and harsh speech is heard and removed, and he has no resentment toward others; it's for that reason that I've consulted the Self-Abiding One.

source_sentence: 常以慈心觀眾生，　　其猶父母愛一子，　而於怨親行平等，　　故我為彼請人王。
translation: Always viewing sentient beings with kindness, they're like a parent who loves a child, and they act equally toward their enemies, so I invite the human king to come for them.

source_sentence: 現有如斯諸功德，　　然我今日以宣陳，　其或未具諸眾等，　　我亦為是諮問佛。
translation: Now, there are all these attributes, but I've explained them today, and I've asked the Buddha about them even though they may not be complete.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今有善根，　　初發問時便剋獲，　藉此菩薩諸功德，　　速證寂靜三昧王。」
translation: Now, I have good roots that I grasped when I first asked, and by these bodhisattvas' virtues, I quickly realized the king of tranquil concentration."

source_sentence: 大方等大集經菩薩念佛三昧分卷第六
translation: Dafangdengdaji jing pusa nianshenfo sanmei fen, vol. 6
